All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
BlackJackClientApp
BlackJackClientApp, this class extends the appication class because it is the client application for the player to play a blackjackgame while connected to a server.
BlackJackClientController
controller class for the BlackJackClient fxml file, this contains the event handlers for the GUI elements and it also is the networking client runnable class, which is why it implements the Runnable interface
BlackJackServer
BlackJackServer class that extends the JFrame class, so it works as a server application to which clients will establish a connection with to play blackJack, the server runs all the logic of the game while the client updates the GUI as needed
BlackJackServerTest
BlackJackServerTest class which holds the main method to run the server gui app
Deck
Deck class, an object of this class can be used to simulate a real life french card deck, it contains an inner card class with attributes a normal card has
